title: JLab JBuds Air Pro Review: Good wireless earbuds for the price of a PS5 game
content:
Just a few years ago, most truly wireless earbuds were really bad. Battery life, synchronization between both buds, charging, and other features often had issues. Fast forward to 2022, and you can get a decent pair of true wireless earbuds for well under $100. One more recent entry is the Jbuds Air Pro from JLab,

The post JLab JBuds Air Pro Review: Good wireless earbuds for the price of a PS5 game appeared first on XDA.
description: The JLab JBuds Air Pro are an inexpensive TWS for people who want IP55 and Bluetooth multipoint. Read our review to know our thoughts!
